text: 9.2: Mt 8.10; Mk 2.3-5; Ru 5.18-20Ana vov phorgim, gumgi mbari bigi rimgi guma mbe, mbe kaan ana ndigap ana han zi. Zisas mbaram mbe garim, mbe guigira ana khothɨgim, ana mba tɨva gangia thav khaŋ mba bigi rimgi guma ga nzuai, “Nan kam, ndu ndav mbɨrari. Ndu fhum muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi, gu nta vhɨzgiap, nta ndɨkndɨk ŋangi.”
